page.title: 08FARMING IN PRESTON.
page.content:
The farm in Preston has belonged to Mr. Huck's family for 65 years, and he has owned it for 25 years. It is called the Village Farm. There are three people working on the farm, Mr. Huck and two other men. They plant their seeds for their new crops in the Autumn. They grow wheat for bread, oil seed rape for the animal's feed in the winter, and they also grow oats. For machinery they have 1 Combine Harvester, 1 big Sprayer, and one large tractor and three small ones. There are no animals on the farm except for two dogs and two cats which are the family pets.
(Continued on page 9)
